import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Navbar from '../../Navbar/Navbar'; import './cartStyles.css' const Cart = ({items}) => { const {id}=useParams(); const CartItem = () => items.length ? ( items.map(item=>{ return(

{item.ItemName}

Price: Rs{item.Price}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

) }) ): (

Nothing.

) return (
You have ordered:
) } const mapStateToProps = (state)=>{ return{ items: state.addedItems } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Cart)
